Dyson Ltd is a British technology company established in the United Kingdom by Sir James Dyson in 1991. It designs and manufactures household appliances such as vacuum cleaners, air purifiers, hand dryers, bladeless fans, heaters, hair dryers, and lights. In January 2019, Dyson announced it was moving its headquarters to Singapore, but it has a research and development unit in the UK. The company has denied that the move was for tax reasons or in relation to Brexit. Dyson has a significant number of employees worldwide, including in the UK.
